import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { SellerService } from 'src/app/services/seller.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-seller-dashboard', templateUrl: './seller-dashboard.component.html', styleUrls: ['./seller-dashboard.component.scss'] }) export class SellerDashboardComponent implements oni { itemList=[{ item_image : 'https://static.toiimg.com/thumb/61050397.cms?imgsize=246859&width=800&height=800', item_name: 'Samosa', item_discount: '5', item_price: '15' }] constructor(private sellerSer:SellerService ){} ngOnInit(): void { this.checkSeller(); } checkSeller(){ let seller = localStorage.getItem("seller"); let sellerVerify = seller && JSON.parse(seller).data.id if(sellerVerify){ this.sellerSer.sellerActive.emit(true); } } }
